speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0225/2008 ) by Mr Libicki, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the environmental impact of the planned gas pipeline in the Baltic Sea to link up Russia and Germany (Petitions 0614/2007 and 0952/2007) [ 2007/2118(INI) ].
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0225/2008 ) by Mr Libicki, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the environmental impact of the planned gas pipeline in the Baltic Sea to link up Russia and Germany (Petitions 0614/2007 and 0952/2007) [ 2007/2118(INI) ].
agenda_item: Environmental impact of the planned gas pipeline in the Baltic Sea to link up Russia and Germany (debate)
